Title: You're Gonna Change (Or I'm Gonna Leave)
Plot: Rayna wants to change her sound and seeks out the help of a highly successful music producer, Liam McGuinnis; Juliette goes on a sham date with a squeaky-clean NFL quarterback as a PR move for her tarnished image; meanwhile, Lamar's plan to delay Coleman with a police traffic stop on his way to an important photo op for both candidates works too well, and Scarlett's relationship with Avery gets rocky.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Judith Hoag, Michiel Huisman, Rya Kihlstedt, Afton Williamson, Nicholas Strong, Tilky Jones, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, Ed Amatrudo, David Alford
